Title: Mona Lisa's Revenge (1)
Plot: Unknown forces bring to life Leonardo Da Vinci's most famous painting, and Clyde's day becomes a nightmare when a school trip descends into disaster. Trapped and without Sarah Jane's help the gang must find a way to battle the awesome abomination.
GuestStars: Suranne Jones, Jeff Rawle, Lizo Mzimba, Liza Sadovy, Paul Kasey, Ace Bhatti
